document_data.name: Mavnar Dyorn
document_data.mainbody: '''Mavnar Dyorn''' was a [[Raumviran]] resident of [[Almorel]] in the [[Hordelands]] in [[1375 DR]].{{Cite dragon/349/The Horde: Barbarians of the Endless Waste}}
document_data.Activities: Mavnar was the elected mayor of the city. Along with his small council, he was responsible for the daily governing of Almorel. Though Almorel was spared from an assault from the [[Grand Army of the Tuigan|Tuigan Horde]] during the great wars, Mavnar believe it prudent to replace Almorel's wooden walls with solid stone to dissuade future aggression from the belligerent nomads. Mavnar also planned to construct a stone keep within the city by enlisting the expertise of [[dwarves]].
